SEARCH
Package com.nickslibrary.datastructures.trees

Class StandardTrie

java.lang.Object
com.nickslibrary.datastructures.trees.StandardTrie
public class StandardTrie extends Object
A standard Trie (prefix tree) implementation for storing and searching words efficiently.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StandardTrie()
    Constructs an empty Trie.

    • insert

      public void insert(String word)
      Inserts a word into the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to insert

    • search

      public boolean search(String word)
      Checks if a word exists in the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to search for
      Returns:
      true if the word exists, false otherwise

    • startsWith

      public boolean startsWith(String prefix)
      Checks if there is any word in the Trie that starts with the given prefix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to check
      Returns:
      true if any word starts with the prefix, false otherwise

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String word)
      Deletes a word from the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to delete
      Returns:
      true if the word was deleted, false if it was not found

    • getFrequency

      public int getFrequency(String word)
      Gets the frequency of a word in the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word whose frequency is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the frequency of the word, or 0 if it is not found

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the entire Trie.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the Trie is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the Trie is empty, false otherwise

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of words stored in the Trie.
      Returns:
      the total word count in the Trie

    • setFrequency

      public boolean setFrequency(String word, int frequency)
      Sets the frequency of a word in the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word whose frequency is to be set
      frequency - the new frequency value (must be >= 0)
      Returns:
      true if the frequency was updated, false if the word does not exist

    • incrementFrequency

      public boolean incrementFrequency(String word)
      Increments the frequency of a word in the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word whose frequency is to be incremented
      Returns:
      true if the frequency was incremented, false if the word does not exist

    • wordCount

      public int wordCount()
      Returns the number of distinct words stored in the Trie.
      Returns:
      the total count of distinct words in the Trie

    • totalWordInstances

      public int totalWordInstances()
      Returns the total number of word instances stored in the Trie, considering word frequencies.
      Returns:
      the total count of all word occurrences in the Trie

    • depth

      public int depth()
      Returns the depth of the Trie, defined as the length of the longest word.
      Returns:
      the maximum depth of the Trie

    • nodeCount

      public int nodeCount()
      Returns the total number of nodes in the Trie.
      Returns:
      the number of nodes in the Trie

    • characterCount

      public int characterCount()
      Returns the total number of characters stored in the Trie.
      Returns:
      the total character count in the Trie

    • getWordsWithPrefix

      public List<String> getWordsWithPrefix(String prefix)
      Retrieves all words in the Trie that start with the given prefix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to search for
      Returns:
      a list of words that start with the given prefix

    • suggest

      public List<String> suggest(String prefix, int limit)
      Suggests a list of words based on the given prefix. This is useful for autocomplete functionality.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to search for suggestions
      limit - the maximum number of suggestions to return
      Returns:
      a list of suggested words, up to the specified limit

    • longestPrefixMatch

      public String longestPrefixMatch(String word)
      Finds the longest prefix of the given word that exists in the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to check
      Returns:
      the longest matching prefix found in the Trie

    • shortestPrefixMatch

      public String shortestPrefixMatch(String word)
      Finds the shortest prefix of the given word that exists as a complete word in the Trie.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to check
      Returns:
      the shortest matching prefix that forms a complete word, or an empty string if none exists

    • hasPrefix

      public boolean hasPrefix(String prefix)
      Checks if there is any word in the Trie that starts with the given prefix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to check
      Returns:
      true if any word starts with the prefix, false otherwise

    • getAllWords

      public List<String> getAllWords()
      Retrieves all words stored in the Trie.
      Returns:
      a list of all words in the Trie

    • getAllWordsSorted

      public List<String> getAllWordsSorted()
      Retrieves all words stored in the Trie in case-sensitive alphabetic order (i.e. Apple, Zebra, banana).
      Returns:
      a sorted list of all words in the Trie

    • getAllWordsByFrequency

      public List<String> getAllWordsByFrequency()
      Retrieves all words stored in the Trie, sorted by their frequency in descending order.
      Returns:
      a list of words sorted by frequency (most frequent words first)

    • printTrie

      public void printTrie()
      Prints the Trie in a structured ASCII format.

    • toDictionaryFormat

      public String toDictionaryFormat()
      Returns all words stored in the Trie in dictionary format (one word per line).
      Returns:
      a String containing all words in lexicographical order, each on a new line

    • toSerializedFormat

      public String toSerializedFormat()
      Serializes the entire Trie structure into a JSON format. This allows the Trie to be saved and later reconstructed.
      Returns:
      a JSON string representing the Trie structure.

    • fuzzySearch

      public List<String> fuzzySearch(String word, int maxEdits)
      Performs a fuzzy search in the Trie, returning words within a given edit distance from the input word. This allows for slight misspellings or variations to be matched.
      Parameters:
      word - the target word to search for.
      maxEdits - the maximum allowed Levenshtein distance.
      Returns:
      a list of words from the Trie that are within the given edit distance.

    • wildcardSearch

      public List<String> wildcardSearch(String pattern)
      Performs a wildcard search in the Trie, returning all words that match the given pattern. Supports: - '?' : Matches exactly one character. - '*' : Matches zero or more characters.
      Parameters:
      pattern - the search pattern containing wildcards.
      Returns:
      a list of words that match the pattern.

    • regexSearch

      public List<String> regexSearch(String regex)
      Searches the Trie for words that match a given regular expression.
      Parameters:
      regex - the regular expression pattern to match words against.
      Returns:
      a list of words that match the regex pattern.

    • replaceWord

      public boolean replaceWord(String oldWord, String newWord)
      Replaces an existing word in the Trie with a new word.
      Parameters:
      oldWord - the word to be replaced.
      newWord - the word to replace it with.
      Returns:
      true if the old word was successfully replaced, false if the old word did not exist.

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(StandardTrie otherTrie)
      Merges another StandardTrie into this trie, adding all words and their frequencies. If a word exists in both tries, their frequencies are summed.
      Parameters:
      otherTrie - the trie to merge with.

    • intersectWith

      public StandardTrie intersectWith(StandardTrie otherTrie)
      Creates a new StandardTrie containing only the words present in both tries. The frequency of each word in the result is the minimum of its frequencies in both tries.
      Parameters:
      otherTrie - the trie to intersect with.
      Returns:
      a new StandardTrie containing the intersection of words.

    • differenceWith

      public StandardTrie differenceWith(StandardTrie otherTrie)
      Creates a new StandardTrie containing words that are present in this trie but not in the other. The frequencies remain the same as in this trie.
      Parameters:
      otherTrie - the trie to subtract from this trie.
      Returns:
      a new StandardTrie containing the difference of words.

    • clone

      public StandardTrie clone()
      Creates a deep copy of this StandardTrie.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      a new StandardTrie that is an exact copy of this trie.

    • trim

      public void trim()
      Trims all words in the Trie by removing leading and trailing spaces. Words with trimmed versions will be reinserted, and the old versions removed.
